attributes.action: TO PRESERVE THE UNITED KINGDOM AND OUR RIGHT TO BE BRITISH
attributes.additional_details:
Because events are unfolding, which through a lack of guidance and leadership on the part of Parliament and this Government might leave the British People without a voice on the future of the UK, the Government is hereby petitioned to grant immediately, a United Kingdom wide Referendum which seeks a decision from the British People on the continued existence of the UK. Said Referendum to be held asap, say no longer than a month from the date of Grant.

If the result(by simple majority) is in favourof the UK, then legislation should be enacted, without delay, which amends all Devolution Acts in 2 ways:
	1). That the wishes of the British People are paramount and cannot be set aside or changed without further UK wide Referenda which authorises the UK Parliament to act on the outcome of their wishes,
	2). No Referenda or Vote can be held in the constituent Countries which affects or threatens the continued existence of the UK.
